Uses of Class
com.fasterxml.util.membuf.Segment

  • Packages that use Segment 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf
    Package that contains public API of the the library.
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base
    Intermediate typed base classes that offer partial implementations of API types and/or refinements, but do not fully implement them.
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl
    Package that contains implementations of the API classes.

    • Uses of Segment in com.fasterxml.util.membuf

      Classes in com.fasterxml.util.membuf with type parameters of type Segment 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Segment<S extends Segment<S>>
      Core definition of containers for individual segments that form physical storage level of the logical queue.
      class  SegmentAllocator<T extends Segment<T>>
      Shared allocator object, used by standardl MemBuffer implementations.

    • Uses of Segment in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base

      Classes in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base with type parameters of type Segment 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChunkyMemBufferBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Intermediate mem buffer base class used for building type-specifc "chunky" buffers, buffers where sequences of primitive values are grouped into distinct entries such that all appends and reads are entry by entry in FIFO order.
      class  MemBufferBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Shared base class for all types of MemBuffer implementations (regardless of underlying content type or streaming/chunked style)
      class  MemBuffersBase<S extends Segment<S>,CB extends ChunkyMemBuffer,SB extends StreamyMemBuffer>
      Container for a set of MemBuffers.
      class  SegmentAllocatorBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Intermediate base class for SegmentAllocators that construct Segments that store byte sequences.
      class  SegmentBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Shared base class for Segment implementations
      class  StreamyMemBufferBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Intermediate mem buffer base class used for building type-specifc "streamy" buffers.
      Subclasses of Segment in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BytesSegment
      Intermediate base class for Segments used to store byte sequence values.
      class  LongsSegment
      Intermediate base class for Segments used to store long-valued sequences.
      class  SegmentBase<S extends Segment<S>>
      Shared base class for Segment implementations
      Fields in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base declared as Segment 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected S MemBufferBase._firstFreeSegment
      Most recently released segment that we hold on to for possible reuse.
      protected S SegmentAllocatorBase._firstReusableSegment
      And here we hold on to segments that have been returned by buffers after use.
      protected S MemBufferBase._head
      Head refers to the segment in which appends are done, which is the last segment allocated.
      protected S SegmentBase._nextSegment
      Next segment in the segment chain
      protected S MemBufferBase._tail
      Tail refers to the segment from which read are done, which is the oldest segment allocated.

    • Uses of Segment in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl

      Subclasses of Segment in com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArrayBytesSegment
      BytesSegment implementation that uses POJAs (Plain Old Java Array) for storing byte sequences.
      class  ArrayLongsSegment
      LongsSegment implementation that uses POJAs (Plain Old Java Array) for storing long sequences.
      class  ByteBufferBytesSegment
      Segment implementation that uses ByteBuffers for storing data.
      class  ByteBufferLongsSegment
      Segment implementation that uses LongBuffers for storing data.
